title: Plug-in LED Night Light Laundry Ombre Purple Dusk-to-Dawn Motion Sensor Night Lamp Plug into Wall Nightlights for Bedroom Kitchen Hallway Stairs
features: ♥Soft Brightness: Smart sensor night lights provide just the right amount of light to guide way in the dark without turning on other lights. Either too bright or too dim light is soft and comfortable to eyes

♥Easy to Plug-in: Compact night light will not block the second outlet, cool to touch, safe and eco-friendly. Perfect for kitchen, bedroom, bathroom, living room, corridor, toilet, stairs, hallway, and other dark corner

♥Automatic Turn on and off: Nightlights motion sensor with build-in smart dusk to dawn sensor, automatically turns on at dusk and turns off at dawn. Automatic sensor night lamp is so smart that help to save energy

♥Long-lasting Lifetime: Auto dimmable LED night light is durable. You have no need to worry about replacing bulb for the bulb can serve a quite long life. Comfortable soft warm white LED lighting costs you less and Iis more energy efficient

♥Unique Design: Square shape nightlights with unique pattern design can not only used as exquisite wall decoration lamp but idea gift for kids and adults on birthday, Housewarming party, Mother's Day, Independence Day and other important holidays
description: Plug-in LED Motion Sensor Night Light

Dusk-to-Dawn motion sensor will detect the light level in your room and automatically adjust its brightness. Sensitive light sensor detecting ambient light level automatically will gradually dim and turn off with the rising sun.
Square shape compact night light, easy to plug into the wall, safe & eco-friendly, does not obstruct the second outlets
Night Lamp is no bulb replacement needed, long-lasting, cool to the touch, low energy consumption and money-saving
Perfect for kitchen, bedroom, bathroom, living room, corridor, toilet, stairs, hallway, nursery and other dark corner decor
